• Improved documentation and guidelines for using 3D modeling (CAD) tools with OpenMETA
  • Added the Analysis Block concept to Parametric Exploration (PET) for more configurable user-side integrations
  • Stability improvements for non-standard Windows and PTC Creo installations
  • Support for OpenModelica 1.12.0
  • Support for PTC Creo 4 and 5
  • Various bug fixes and improvements
